name: STECInfectionTestsForSTECEColiO157OrShigaToxinVerotoxinAntibody
title: STEC Infection (Tests for STEC , E. coli O157, or Shiga Toxin [Verotoxin] Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of STEC antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Escherichia coli O157:H7 Ab; Escherichia coli verotoxin Ab;  

LOINC search: “(O157 or shiga or enterohemorrhagic or verotoxin) Ab -isolate -culture -milk -panel”),(Exclusion Criteria: The following were excluded because they are not shiga toxin producing organisms:
--- 20812-4 Escherichia coli 987P [Presence] in Small intestine Tissue by Immunofluorescence
--- 20814-0 Escherichia coli F41 [Presence] in Small intestine Tissue by Immunofluorescence
--- 20817-3 Escherichia coli K88 [Presence] in Small intestine Tissue by Immunofluorescence
--- 20822-3 Escherichia coli K99 [Presence] in Small intestine Tissue by Immunofluorescence)
